actions.description: The altisaur makes one Stomp attack and one Tail attack. The altisaur can't make both attacks against the same target.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 33 (7d6 + 9) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 22 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.
actions.name: Stomp

actions.description: 14 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 45 (8d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage, and the target is pushed up to 20 feet horizontally from the altisaur.
actions.name: Tail

specialTraits.description: The altisaur has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance
